DOC.brief_summary: Multi-centre interventional cross-sectional prevalence study Assessment Rosacea Prevalence General Population .
DOC.detailed_description: Primary objective : Assessment prevalence rosacea general population per country use subject questionnaire dermatologist diagnosis
DOC.criteria: Part I The following subject include study : Subjects age 18 65 year old general population Subjects willing complete questionnaire Part II The following subject include Part II study : Subjects screen positive rosacea first part study select random method Subjects give inform consent participate Part II study
